txt.en: Defeated Karghosh, leader of the pack and terror of the Floodfells

One of the warg packs that stalks the Floodfells is led by a large and frightening beast called Karghosh. If he is defeated, it is possible the rest of the pack will disband and flee the area. If this proves untrue, at least the most ferocious of the creatures will no longer threaten the people who dwell alongside the Langflood.

One of the warg packs that stalks the Floodfells is led by a large and frightening beast called Karghosh. If he is defeated, it is possible the rest of the pack will disband and flee the area.
You have silenced the howls of Karghosh for good. No longer will he lead his pack to prey upon the folk who dwell alongside the Langflood.
